s1.name: ASM Framework plugin for Eclipse
s1.p: ASM Framework plugin provides the ASM Framework libraries.
s1.subtitle: Download
s1.p: You can download the plugin from the ObjectWeb Forge site.
s1.subtitle: Installation
s1.p: All what you need to install ASM Framework plugin is to unzip the zip file into your %Eclipse%/plugin directory and restart Eclipse. You don't need to do anymore to install ASM Framework.
Note: ASM Framework tested and works on Eclipse 3.0 / 3.0.1 / 3.1M2
